forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Desktop mode grabbing improvement

comments.text: Hi! Here's what's new in version 178.2 (you're on [version]):
We fixed an issue with grabbing triggerable things in Desktop mode, which occurred when you have Valve Index or Oculus connected! Thx Nic!
We moved the VR hardware info to the back of the Me -> "..." dialog, so that you can now see it in both desktop mode and VR mode!

thread.latestCommentText: We moved the VR hardware info to the back of the Me -> "..." dialog, so that you can now see it in both desktop mode and VR mode!
